Author: Minmoose, Asgard and Contributors
Name: Brio
Punchline: Enhanced GPosing! A utility for improving the G-Pose experience in FFXIV.
Description:
Brio is suite of tools that gives you advanced control to edit and pose actors during G-Pose.

- Advanced actor posing 
	- While animating
	- Adjust actor positions without them resetting
	- Overlay and graphical posing modes
- Creation of up to 239 G-Pose actors
- Creation of custom lights
- Supports integration with Penumbra, Glamourer & Customize+
- Offline import and export of MCDF files onto G-Pose actors
- Play XAT .xcp camera files
- Play/Blend animations of G-Pose actors
- Control Time/Weather in both the Overworld and G-Pose
- Change the active festivals and apply up to 4 at once
- Add/Remove Status Effects of G-Pose actors

Plugin from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ottermandias/SeaOfStars/main/repo.json

Author: Anna
Changelog: - Fix config not saving when edited from Penumbra's settings integration
Description:
Heliosphere is a mod manager and platform designed to work directly with
Penumbra. It enables efficient downloads and fast installs to let you get back
to the fun part of mods: using them.

Heliosphere supports:
- Direct install to Penumbra
- Compressed and deduplicated (read: small) downloads
- Automatic updates (optional)
- Version history
- Mod changelogs
- Pictures in Penumbra
- And more

Give Heliosphere a try, and see if you can't say goodbye to any old mod
platform you were using before.

Plugin from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ottermandias/SeaOfStars/main/repo.json
Name: Heliosphere
Punchline: An efficient mod manager and platform that integrates directly with Penumbra.
TestingChangelog:
- Fix a possible error in the multiple directory warning
- Fix updates for mods with duplicated files
- Add a first-time-user setup window to make onboarding easier

Author: Ice
Name: Ice's Cosmic Exploration (ICE)
Punchline: Welcome to, the dark side of, the MOOOON
Description:
The one-stop shop to your cosmic exploration needs! This plugin is meant to be a collective source of being able to grind out your gather and crafter relics, while also being able to help grind out the score to 500k on each class for that sleek black mech that you want ~.

- Has the ability to re-roll missions for you until you get the desired one that you want to farm
- Crafters can be fully automated with support of artisan. 
- Fisher can also be fully automated with the support of AutoHook and Navmesh
- Botanist/Miner only need Navmesh, thanks to having gathering built in directly to the plugin <3. 
- Setup what items you want to buy from the shop for cosmocredits, or spend your planetary tokens on the cosmowheel of fortune!

Plugin from https://puni.sh/api/repository/ice
Changelog:
- Reworked/adjusted the coding for how fisher works. Has some more safeguards in place/put some more logging in (I hate fishing I hate fishing I hate fishing)
- Cleaned up some of the redundant code/repeating code that came with this. . . 
- Btn/Miner now should check for being in the gathering state vs just... waiting for the gathering ui to be visible -> thinking it isn't. This should hopefully fix the random naving issues? Please report if it still is trying to pathfind instead of getting collectables
- Adjusted node positioning for #1312/1313 Miner

Author: Liza Carvelli & various contributors
Name: Questionable
Punchline: A tiny quest helper plugin.
Description:
A small quest helper plugin designed to automatically do your quests for you where possible. Utilizes navmesh to automatically travel to all quest waypoints and (attempts to) complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single-player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported.

Required Plugins: vnavmesh, TextAdvance, Lifestream

Plugin from https://puni.sh/api/plugins

Splatoon script for this must be disabled until the point
the quest wants it or things will break because of the transform
effect. -Kiarra

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: Rotation Solver Reborn
Description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.

Plugin from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/CombatRebornRepo/main/pluginmaster.json
Punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* refactor: Churin Rotations by @aventurescence in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/1168
* Improve RDM/SGE action checks by @LTS-FFXIV in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/1169
* Disabled DSRViper rotationa and updated supporters list by @LTS-FFXIV in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/1170


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/compare/7.4.1.8...7.4.1.9

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Splatoon
Punchline: Redefining FFXIV navigation with unlimited, precise waymarks.
Description:
Splatoon is a powerful accessibility tool. It revolutionizes gameplay with its custom waymark system, offering the ability to create unlimited grouped waymarks, labels, and actor indicators with exacting pixel precision. This feature empowers players by making crucial objects and events more visually discernible, thereby facilitating quicker reactions. However, it's important to note that the plugin does not come pre-loaded with presets. Players have the freedom to craft their own or import existing ones, offering a personalized touch to their gaming experience.

Plugin from https://puni.sh/api/plugins
Changelog: - Fixed some compatibility issues

Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again!
